Author: BipolarSkeleton
Text: Sounds like you are in a really tough spot but I’m positive you will be able to pull through   I personally am not a big fan of home wood but if it’s homewood or your life you have to choose your life that’s the only option you have   There comes a time when we have to buckle down and fight and it seems that time has come for you   You can do this I know how had this is I have been in and out of hospitals and residential treatment centres for years it’s hard to do as someone else says but it’s sometimes important
